title: How to build an CentOS 7 VM for Cisco IOS XE devices
slug: In this lab you will learn how to build a CentOS 7 Virtual Machine (VM), package it in the Cisco Application Framework format, known as IOx (IOS + LinuX) and host it on a Catalyst 9000 device.
